Package uk.co.flax.biosolr.ontology.core.ols

Class OLSHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.flax.biosolr.ontology.core.ols.OLSHttpClient

  • public class OLSHttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    HTTP Client class for calling OLS.

    Created by Matt Pearce on 10/12/15.

    Author:
    Matt Pearce

    • Constructor Detail

      • OLSHttpClient

        public OLSHttpClient​(int threadPoolSize,
                     java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory threadFactory)
        Construct an HTTP client for accessing the OLS web API.
        Parameters:
        threadPoolSize - the size of the threadpool to use.
        threadFactory - the thread factory to use to build the client threads.

    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown​()
        Shut down the client.

      • callOLS

        public <T> java.util.List<T> callOLS​(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> urls,
                                     java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                              throws OntologyHelperException
        Call the OLS service with a collection of URLs, each of which should resolve to the same object type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of object being returned.
        Parameters:
        urls - the URLs to call.
        clazz - the class being returned.
        Returns:
        a collection of objects. Never null.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur making the calls.
